trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Magalia
There were no other sightings in Magalia on or around May 15th 2002
divs: sighting detailson 5\15\02, 10:35 pm, my 7 yr old son and i were laying out on our front deck.we we counting satellites and meteorites. laying flat on our backs lookingstraight up, i first observed what was a pulsating satellite. i have seen manysatellites in my time, but this was new to me. then within a minute or so, iobserved out of nowhere either the same, or a new object light up brighter thanany other star directly above our heads, then fade. then a few degrees se, itlit up again, this time getting my boys attention. it again faded, and movedagian a few degrees s and faded, not to be seen again. this scared my boy, as wethen went inside, and i am now reporting to you. i have lived near the beale afbflightline, and this is the second encounter in 3 years and i cannot sit backand say everything is ok! its not, and i know what we saw! suggestions?
